### Using landscapemetrics in a tidy workflow

#### Use multiple metric functions
We think that it is in general not advisable to use `lsm_calculate` in a 
research analysis, since you can't use that many correlated metrics in a 
meaningful blabla.


```{r}

patch_metrics <-  dplyr::bind_rows(
  lsm_p_cai(landscape),
  lsm_p_circle(landscape),
  lsm_p_enn(landscape)
  )

patch_metrics
```
